Simon Hamelin

Hello! I'm Simon, a full-stack developer. I love to build websites as well as server-side programs that help accomplish great things. I'm currently attending university to become a Computer Engineer. During my free time, I work on personal projects that can range from a simple website to systems powered by Artificial Intelligence. I'm always looking for new opportunities, and working with people drives me to do my best. Don't hesitate to contact me if you'd like to discuss something!
